title: Small Worlds with a Difference: New Gatekeepers and the Filtering of Political Information on Twitter

author: Pascal Jürgens, Johannes Gutenberg University Mainz

segmentation: Well, good morning everyone and thanks for getting up so early.
I must say I'm very pleased to speak in front of the most determined and most enthusiastic involved.
